name: npc_dota_hero_ogre_magi
bio_loc:
The ordinary ogre is the creature for whom the phrase 'As dumb as a bag of rock hammers' was coined. In his natural state, an ogre is supremely incapable of doing or deciding anything. Clothed in dirt, he sometimes finds himself accidentally draped in animal skins after eating lanekill. Not an especially social creature, he is most often found affectionately consorting with the boulders or tree-stumps he has mistaken for kin (a factor that may explain the ogre's low rate of reproduction). However, once every generation or so, the ogre race is blessed with the birth of a two-headed Ogre Magi, who is immediately given the traditional name of Aggron Stonebreak, the name of the first and perhaps only wise ogre in their line's history.

With two heads, Ogre Magi finds it possible to function at a level most other creatures manage with one. And while the Ogre Magi will win no debates (even with itself), it is graced with a divine quality known as Dumb Luck--a propensity for serendipitous strokes of fortune which have allowed the ogre race to flourish in spite of enemies, harsh weather, and an inability to feed itself. It's as if the Goddess of Luck, filled with pity for the sadly inept species, has taken Ogre Magi under her wing. And who could blame her? Poor things.
hype_loc: With a chance to multiply the outcome of each spell they cast, a bit of luck is all Ogre Magi needs to burn enemies to cinder, or boost the power of his allies. Of course, luck can be difficult to rely upon...
npe_desc_loc: Uses a touch of luck to amplify his skills

facets.description_loc: Multicast chance is increased by  {s:bonus_strength_mult}% of Ogre Magi's Strength.
facets.name: ogre_magi_fat_chance

facets.description_loc: Level requirement of all spells and talents reduced by {s:bonus_required_level}. You get {s:bonus_level_one_ability_points} Ability Points at level one and {s:bonus_level_two_ability_points} Ability Points at level two.
facets.name: ogre_magi_learning_curve

abilities.name: ogre_magi_fireblast
abilities.desc_loc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
abilities.lore_loc: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
notes_loc: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a %multicast_delay% seconds interval.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_ignite
abilities.desc_loc: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
notes_loc: Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units in a %ignite_multicast_aoe% area of effect.
Ignite hitting an already affected unit adds to the burn duration.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_bloodlust
abilities.desc_loc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.
abilities.lore_loc: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
notes_loc: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an %multicast_bloodlust_aoe% area of effect to receive Bloodlust.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast
abilities.desc_loc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing %base_damage% + %str_multiplier%x Ogre's Strength in damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is %scepter_mana%%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
abilities.lore_loc: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
notes_loc: When Multicast, Unrefined Fireblast hits the same target each time with a %multicast_delay% seconds interval.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_smash
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next %attacks% attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.
notes_loc: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an %multicast_fireshield_aoe% area of effect to receive Fire Shield.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_dumb_luck
abilities.desc_loc: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_multicast
abilities.desc_loc: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.
abilities.lore_loc: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.
notes_loc: Only targeted abilities and items have a chance to be multicast.
Targeted abilities and items apply to additional enemies and neutrals in an AoE around Ogre. Fireblast and Unrefined Fireblast hit the same target multiple times.
facets_loc: Multicast chance is increased by  %strength_mult%%% of Ogre Magi's Strength.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_5
talents.desc_loc: Also reduces cooldown of Unrefined Fireblast

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_ogre_magi_dumb_luck_mana
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_mana_per_str}/{s:bonus_mana_regen_per_str} Dumb Luck Mana/Mana Regen Per Strength
